Since 1958, when the four-team World Cup group stage was formalised, how many of the 384 teams involved have endured the short, three-match process without dropping a single point?
Twenty nine. So, … [+13518 chars]

articles.title: 2022/23 Cazoo World Darts Championship draw - PDC.tv
articles.description: Peter Wright will begin his defence of the Cazoo World Darts Championship against either Mickey Mansell or Ben Robb, after the draw for the sport's showpiece event was made on Monday.

articles.author: Nathan Ridley
articles.title: Ghana coach takes selfie with crying Son Heung-min after World Cup match - The Mirror
articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur's Son Heung-min was in tears after South Korea were narrowly beaten by Ghana at the World Cup, but it didn't stop a member of the opposition staff from attempting a post-match selfie
articles.content:
A member of Ghana 's coaching staff bizarrely attempted to take a selfie with a tearful Son Heung-min after his South Korea suffered a bruising defeat at the World Cup.
Mohammed Kudus inspired Ghana… [+2955 chars]
